item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Resource
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Resource Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Service_Resource is used to store information related to a service. It is used for determining the correct resource to connect to for a given service, like NAS, Evault, etc. Local backendIpAddress The backend IP address for this resource Type: string frontendIpAddress The frontend IP address for this resource Type: string id Type: integer
